credit_line: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen

title: Livery trimming
description: Design of the arms Mexico alternating with French imperial crown set between borders with diamond-shaped ornaments. In brown on a white ground. Probably made for Maximilian, Emperor of Mexico.
